metadata.title: CVE-2015-0227 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Apache WSS4J before 1.6.17 and 2.x before 2.0.2 allows remote attackers tobypass the requireSignedEncryptedDataElements configuration via a vectorsrelated to "wrapping attacks."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0227` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwss4j-java - 1.6.15-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wss4j package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.15-2').
